meanings.sent1: The haunted house was the fearfullest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The thunderstorm was the fearfullest thing she had ever experienced.
meanings.sent3: The fearfullest movie made everyone jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the forest at night was the fearfullest cloak.
meanings.sent5: The fearfullest scream echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.sent1: She had the fearfullest feeling that someone was watching her.
meanings.sent2: He was the fearfullest of all the students when it came to public speaking.
meanings.sent3: The fearfullest cat hid under the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The fearfullest shadow followed her wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The fearfullest thought crept into her mind as she walked alone at night.

meanings.sent1: The fearfullest child clung to his mother's hand tightly.
meanings.sent2: She felt the fearfullest before going on stage for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The fearfullest puppy whimpered during the loud fireworks.
meanings.sent4: The fearfullest moment was waiting for the test results to be announced.
meanings.sent5: The fearfullest dream left her sweating and shaking in bed.
